title.rendered: Amazing Deals On the Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge; Still A Smartphone Legend

content.rendered:
The Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge has quickly become one of the most affordable flagship Samsung handsets since the release of the S8 series and the Galaxy Note 8. The S7 Edge was the first smartphone ever released to have a professional dual grade camera, meaning that you can take stunning photos in any lighting conditions.

Add to that a beautiful sleek design and impressive speedy charging, and you have a handset that packs a lot of power at an affordable price. Now really is the time to check out some of the latest Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge pay monthly deals.

If you’ve forgotten, here’s precisely what you get with the S7 Edge.

Release date – March 2016

Build – Aluminium frame with front and back glass (Gorilla Glass 4)

Screen size – 5.5 inches

Memory – 32GB, 64GB and 128GB

Operating system – Android 6.0 up to 7.0

Camera – Dual 12MP

Battery – Up to 27 hours talk time

For the full specifications click here to view on GSM arena.

Before you buy why not have a read of these impartial reviews below.

http://www.knowyourmobile.com/mobile-phones/samsung-galaxy-s7-edge/23457/samsung-galaxy-s7-edge-review-specs-price-features-camera-performance-display-galaxy-s8
